Package jade.core.replication

Interface MainReplicationSlice

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, Service.Slice
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainReplicationProxy
public interface MainReplicationSlice extends Service.Slice
The horizontal interface for the JADE kernel-level service managing the main-container replication subsystem installed in the platform.
Author:
Giovanni Rimassa - FRAMeTech s.r.l.
